about_the_game: RepoRocket is a user-friendly repository manager designed to simplify downloading, organizing, and launching applications from public repositories. It offers an intuitive interface with search functionality, a customizable app library, and cross-device sync for configurations and save files. Easily manage your repository-based apps, ensuring seamless access and functionality across all devices
detailed_description: RepoRocket is a user-friendly repository manager designed to simplify downloading, organizing, and launching applications from public repositories. It offers an intuitive interface with search functionality, a customizable app library, and cross-device sync for configurations and save files. Easily manage your repository-based apps, ensuring seamless access and functionality across all devices

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS / SteamOS 3.0 or newer
  • Processor: Dual-core 64-bit processor, 2.0 GHz (e.g., Intel Core i3-4130 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 / AMD Radeon R5 / NVIDIA GTX 650 or equivalent (OpenGL 4.6 or Vulkan support required)
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS / SteamOS 3.0 or newer
  • Processor: Quad-core 64-bit processor, 3.0 GHz (e.g., Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 560 or better (Vulkan-capable GPU)
  • Storage: 650 MB available space

name: RepoRocket

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual-Core CPU (Intel Core i3-2120 / AMD Athlon II X4 630 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (Intel HD Graphics 4000 or AMD equivalent)
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-Core CPU (Intel Core i5-6500 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or newer)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU (NVIDIA GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850 or newer)
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: RepoRocket is a sleek repository manager for downloading, organizing, and launching apps from repositories. Search, explore, and manage your app library with ease. Includes cross-device sync for configurations and save files, ensuring seamless access and organization across devices.
